Name: Third
About the game: You wake up in a room. A man talks through the speaker welcomes you and invites you to participate in an experimental game. However, the game is not what you thought, and you seem to be intentionally trapped. You must try to solve puzzles to escape while the creator of the game attempts to fool you. As you get deeper into the experiment, you realize that something else is wrong... Inspired by The Witness , The Stanley Parable , and The Pervert's Guide to Ideology , Third is an 2D top-down adventure game. Explore the endless cycle and discover the deepest secret of the evil experiment.
Meta Title: Third: Feb 2, 2023, Godfrey Yang and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Third? Check out the release date (Feb 2, 2023), developer insights from Godfrey Yang, and a complete game summary.
